email_text:
Subject: Your Amazon Order #1234567890 Confirmation

Dear [Customer Name],

Thank you for shopping with Amazon! Your recent order has been successfully processed and is on its way to being shipped to you. Below are the details of your order:

Order Number: #1234567890
Order Date: October 15, 2021
Estimated Delivery Date: October 20, 2021

Billing Address:
[Customer's Billing Address]

Shipping Address:
[Customer's Shipping Address]

Order Details:
- Item 1: [Product Name] - $XX.XX
- Item 2: [Product Name] - $XX.XX
- Item 3: [Product Name] - $XX.XX

Subtotal: $XXX.XX
Shipping & Handling: $X.XX
Tax: $X.XX
Total: $XXX.XX

Payment Method: Visa ending in XXXX

If you have any questions or concerns about your order, please don't hesitate to contact our customer service team. You can reach us at [Customer Service Phone Number] or [Customer Service Email Address].

Thank you for choosing Amazon for your online shopping needs. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again in the future.

Warm regards,

Amazon Customer Service Team
